name: osi4kjb-currentuser-theme
description: A Kajabi helper theme that allows you to get the current user information to be used for client-side scripting. It only sends information of the logged in user within the current browser session.

scripts.build: rm $npm_package_name.zip; rm -rf $npm_package_name; cp -r src $npm_package_name; zip -r $npm_package_name.zip $npm_package_name; rm -rf $npm_package_name

author: Jason Go
